type.description: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc

typeCode.description: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown

issuedBy.description: Internet of logistics identity code of issuing party.

key.description: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

LineType.description: Line type - e.g. ITM for Item, PCK for Packing, FRT for Freight charge, INS for Insurance charge for invoice charges breakdown

SubTotalAmount.description: Product subtotal before discount and tax - CALCULATED: Quantity x UnitPrice / QuantityForUnitPrice

BeforeDiscountAmount.description: Amount on which the discount is calculated - CALCULATED:  = SubTotalAmount

Amount.description: Discount amount - CALCULATED: BeforeDiscountAmount x Percent

Description.description: Discount reason description - e.g. Christmas Sale

SubTotalDiscountAmount.description: Total discount amount for this line - CALCULATED: Discount Amount + Discount OtherAmount

BeforeTaxAmount.description: Amount on which tax is applied - CALCULATED: SubTotalAmount - SubTotalDiscountAmount

Category.description: Tax category - e.g. StandardRate, Exempt from Tax (and by implication, the rate that applies, the actual percentage is dependent on the tax jurisdiction)

SubTotalTaxAmount.description: Tax amount - CALCULATED: BeforeTaxAmount x Tax Percent

SubTotalLineAmount.description: Total line amount after discount and tax - CALCULATED: SubTotalAmount - SubTotalDiscountAmount + SubTotalTaxAmount
